prompts:
Return the best ordering of 10 of the documents below given the query. Return only a python list of docID strings with a length of exactly 10 strings.

Example output format: ["docID1",...,"dockID10"]

Query: chair and a half recliner

Documents:

23199: 40 '' wide manual standard recliner. accent your living space or home theater in a casual , comfortable style with this reclining chair . this design features a tall , tight back with a defined headrest that cradles you in comfort . a tight seat cushion is an ideal place to rest and will retain its shape over time . lofty pad arms frame the piece and add even more comfort to this already plush frame . vertical seaming on the seat back and front rail lend a subtly tailored appearance , and the piece fully reclines for even more versatility . it rests on a base with no visible feet , giving it a low-profile silhouette . pair it with the coordinating reclining sofa or reclining console loveseat to complete the collection .

30255: theodore 22.5 '' wide power glider standard recliner. this swivel recliner creates the ideal seat to kick back and catch up on your favorite shows . it 's built with a solid and engineered wood frame and features a bucket-like silhouette with curved arms . the swivel base allows you to turn a full 360° , so you can easily spin out of conversations and towards the snack table . the polyester upholstery is filled with foam and has a spring seat construction for just the right amount of support as you sit . this power recliner is operated by a push button so you can effortlessly adjust from seating to napping .

17196: routt 25.2 '' wide manual home theater recliner. offer your room an exceptional design and bring excellent comfort and a classic look . this recliner is the best choice to unwind and relax your body . this recliner is perfect for any place , including office , home theater , cozy living room , bedroom , rec room , dining establishment , or study . just simply push back and recline , you can enjoy the comfortable long-term sitting , tv viewing , or relax your body . conforming to the ergonomic principle , the recliner supports your neck , arm , back , and legs at the correct angle so as to offer utmost comfort . built on a sturdy frame and made of soft fabric and high-density foam , this recliner is built to last , withstand up to 275 lbs . a clean styling design offers a generous seat size and comfort . easy to assemble according to the instruction .

1073: pakswith 40.55 '' wide top grain leather chair and a half. the perfect perch for your teen to get cozy while catching up on some summer reading or working on homework , this chair and a half is a must-have for your abode . crafted from a blend of solid and manufactured wood , the frame strikes a clean-lined silhouette for a dash of what ’ s modern , and features foam-filled genuine leather upholstery . boasting hues of black , chocolate , and beige , it complements a variety of design aesthetics from classic to industrial and more .

17222: ingmari 35 '' wide manual glider standard recliner. the motion recliner has a soft linen upholstered seat and back , it provides you a relaxed leisure time . you can put the chair backward to lay down as a small bed . this recliner is ideal for any room where relaxation is the order , like the den , media room , or man cave .

29994: aiken 34 '' wide faux leather power wall hugger standard recliner. the power motion recliner is the comfort you have been searching for . this chair features soft faux leather fabric and a power motion recline . if you are looking for a recliner that can save you some space , this is for you . which makes it perfect for small living spaces . also , the two-button operating system makes confirms this recliner is effortless to use . with its channel tufting back design and plush arms , just picture yourself enjoying your favorite television show in ultimate comfort . the transitional design of this recliner is sure to become the best seat in the house .

42654: kai 36 '' wide manual standard recliner. this product is a single-seat recliner made for full-body support providing a weightless feel and total relaxation . featuring solid structure , dream coils® , and fine stitched tufted black or java faux leather , this great recliner is very durable and easy to clean . its manual pull handle gives a smooth , quiet , and effortless recline as you sit back and relax in style and ultimate comfort . the kai recliner is fitted with a padded cushion and back in high-density foam providing exceptional support . the engineered wooden frame sets the structure where design and elegance come together . built with longevity in mind , this must-have piece has been designed to help reduce stress on the spine providing proper body alignment . marring simplicity and style , the kai is ready for many years of enjoyment in your home .

2656: daryana 26.5 '' wide manual rocker standard recliner. the faux leather recliner chair is a perfect piece for any room in your home . this chair exudes luxury and comfort when both backward and in the reclining position while the smooth bonded faux leather adds sophistication , giving you style with no cost to relaxation potential . the wing-back swivel recliner chair with faux leather is ideal for any casual or professional working area , living room , executive lounge , and even in the lobby . it provides comfortable support with a comfortable and convenient design . this chair can recline and features a 360-degree swivel , so you can sit upright to work , lounge back to read or watch tv , or simply take a nap in the afternoon sun .

3087: chillicothe 32.5 '' wide manual rocker standard recliner. a slight back edge flare adds a playful modern accent to this charming product delivers comfort , making it an ideal addition to any room of the home . plush foam cushioning and a 360â° swivel base function as a useful accent chair and a manual latch is within easy reach when it 's time to kick back and relax . the smooth reclining action moves the back and footrest incrementally in tandem , preventing the need to adjust each component separately . the 360â° swivel base is ring-shaped for stability and wo n't lock or jam , allowing free and easy movement .

24889: dittmyre 38.6 '' wide manual standard recliner. expertly crafted for style , this lift chair can be used in the home , recreation room , and other business places for its sleek and sophisticated look . have it right away , enjoy your favorite entertainment more , and fully relax your body and mood . upholstered in soft and yarn-dyed fabric and filled with high-density sponge , this chair features an overstuffed back , thick cushions , and yarn-dyed upholstery , offering you more comfort than expected . extending footrest and reclining features allows you to fully stretch and relax , ideal for watching tv , movie , sleeping , and reading .

24878: arife 32 '' wide manual standard recliner. the recliner offers comfort , style and value for any home . reflects sleek styling , cozy seating and smooth upholstery provides relaxation from seat to toe with an easy to reach external handle for operating the reclining mechanism . update your living room environment with this comfortable , recliner chair it 's great for any space and makes it perfect to relax , take a nap or read a book .

31234: staciee 38 '' wide faux leather power home theater recliner. after a long day at work or running errands , you deserve to relax , so why not sit back in this reclining armchair to destress in style . a versatile design that can blend in with a variety of ensembles , it showcases a clean-lined frame with polyester upholstery and boxy arms . beyond the reclining design and rising footrest , it features a push-button storage in the arms , a usb port , and a handy swiveling tray table that stashes in an arms storage area when not in use .

16790: minogue 32 '' wide power lift assist standard recliner. this recliner allows you to rise out of your seat with ease while providing padding in all the right places for added comfort . the infinite position recliner transitions between reclining , sitting and lifting and can stop at any position in-between with the easy to use wired attached remote . perfect for living rooms , bedrooms , theater rooms and media rooms . features round arms , tufted back cushion , and an attached headrest pillow to provide comfort and added style . firmly padded armrests add to the comfort but also allow for a stable grip . full chaise pad between the chair and the leg rest to support the legs for a truly comfortable recliner . ul approved , easy-to-use wired controller . features a backup to protect against power outages that will return you to the upright position . euro firm cushions are filled with high-density foam , polyester fiber and an independently wrapped pocketed coil spring system for a firm custom sit . insulated spring clips for noise reduction . backup 9-volt batteries not included .

20495: lieb 47 '' wide manual standard recliner. kick back and relax in this med-century-modern-inspired manual recliner ! striking a chair-and-a-half silhouette , this dapper design is founded on a solid and manufactured wood frame with a wide , gently slanted backrest , tuxedo arms , and a hidden metal base . brushed polyester upholstery envelops each seat , accented by button tufting and piped edging for a tailored touch , while thick padding provides comfortable support . a quick pull of the side lever reclines the chair , flipping up a footrest so you can relax solo or with your significant other .

22558: toyei 26.5 '' wide manual standard recliner with massager. their charming recliner club chair offers impressive comfort while maximizing your living space with its petite design . the recliner has an ergonomic design , product engineering , and uncompromising quality . this chair gives you the ultimate relaxation . made from the highest quality fabric over a sturdy construction , this is a piece that will last you for years to come . simply push back to recline , no levers or buttons required . comfortable seat and back support for long-term sitting , tv viewing , or a relaxed recline . clean styling offers a generous seat size and comfort . great for living room , media , and master bedrooms .
